_header: Christ that again has made free
_description: James Ryman, a version of the hymn ‘Christe redemptor omnium’ — seven quatrains (aabb) and 4-line burden (cacc): ‘Criste redemptor omnium / Ex patre patris vnice / Solus ante principium / Natus ineffabiliter’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Crist that ayene hast made man freeEx patre patris
                    vnice…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…With the fader and holy goostBothe thre and one of mughtes
                    moost
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 194-5.
